example[0]: The difference in quality was immediately apparent.
example[1]: He left suddenly, for no apparent reason.
example[2]: It soon became apparent that we had a major problem.
example[3]: It is apparent from scientific studies that the drug has some fairly nasty side effects.
note[1]: it is apparent from something that
example[4]: It was apparent to everyone that he was seriously ill.
note[2]: it is apparent to somebody that
definition[1]: seeming to have a particular feeling or attitude, although this may not be true
example[5]: He did well in his exams, despite his apparent lack of interest in his work.
